recipe.title: Firecracker Spinach Salad with Orange Sesame Dressing
ingredients: 2 tablespoons mixture of black sesame seeds and white sesame seeds, for garnish
instructions: 1. For the dressing, cook the orange juice in a saucepan until reduced by half. Combine with the honey, sesame oil, soy sauce, vinegar, water and hot sauce in a blender. Add the shallot and ginger and process until smooth. Store in the refrigerator.
2. For the salad, mix the spinach, daikon sprouts, carrot and jicama in large bowl. Add the dressing and toss to coat well. Garnish with the sesame seeds.
